nodes.text: This man lived on the planet Dalicron-4 during the time of the Galactic Empire.
The man lived on Dalicron-4 with his wife and his son, Caeleb. They were all Force-sensitive and lived in a house inside a "bubble" where the Force didn't exist.

In 3 ABY, the dark Jedi Tol Skaros traveled to the house where the family lived and planned to capture Caeleb. He attacked the boy's parents, send his nek battle dogs against Caeleb's mother, while he personally engaged in combat with the boy's father. The man fought back with a green-bladed lightsaber, but he couldn't overcome Skaros, who had superior combat expertise. After his wife was killed, the man became overcome with grief and Skaros killed him as well.
